sentences.sentence: When we talk to our web developers and designers, we expect to communicate in plain language, not post-modern-neo-techno gobbledy-gook, or Klingon, or even Middle Earth elfin.
sentences.translation: 当跟我们的网页发展商或设计者对话时，我们会要求用清晰的语言来进行交流，不是后现代新技术语言或一些淘气的语言。

sentences.sentence: Darren Gook, Senior Marine Biologist at the Great Yarmouth Sea-Life Centre, holds Ruby the albino lobster.
sentences.translation: 资深海洋生物学家达伦·约克在大雅茅斯海洋生命中心举着白化龙虾鲁比。 据报道，龙虾患白化病的机率是三千万分之一。
